Sachi Nanjou
Sachi Nanjou (南条 幸)
Sachi is a young woman pursuing a career as a manga artist. She befriends Onodera Punpun and serves an important role in his life.

Voice Actors
No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles here.
